about_the_game:
Vessel of Succubus is a free DLC that features a thrilling 100,000-word narrative and dozens of breathtaking CG illustrations.

Celine, a steadfast and righteous female knight.
However, when her body transforms into that of a succubus, and she gains the power and strength to do as she pleases, able to bend others to her will with a mere flick of her finger or a single word, what will she do?
With her former comrades-in-arms on one side and the endless thirst for desire and domination that comes with being a succubus on the other, can she stay true to herself?
Will she be the female knight, or will she embrace her new form as the Queen of Succubi?

Vessel of Succubus is a tale of corruption and domination...

content_descriptors.notes: This work contains nudity, sexual description, sexual assault ,non-consensual sex and other pornographic content. Please pay attention when browsing in public places.

name: Resist the succubus-Vessel of succubus DLC
short_description: This is a DLC about corruption and domination, featuring Celine, a righteous female knight. However, when her body transforms into that of a succubus, and she gains limitless power and strength, able to bend others to her will with a mere flick of her finger, what will she do?
